Clears and deletes all in this.

Parameters:
deleteBuffers If to delete buffers or not, used if you want the buffers in this after deleting this.

bool SFDFile::load (  BitBuffer &  buff  ) 
 

Load.

bool SFDFile::merge (  SFDFile &  other  ) 
 

Merge Assumes that the final, after more merges, SFDFile covers a square area.

Might also assume other less obvious things.

Parameters:
other The SFDFile to merge with this, buffers might be moved from other so it might not be useable after this.

bool SFDFile::save (  BitBuffer &  buff,
int  wfdVersion
) 
 

Save.

Parameters:
buff The buffer to save to.
wfdVersion The version, only version 0 supported by clients now.
